### Linear regression with flat priors

A simple, one-variable Bayesian linear regression model that uses flat priors for the coefficients.

```{r linear_uninformative_greta}
# variables & priors
int  <- variable()
coef <- variable()
sd   <- cauchy(0, 3, truncation = c(0, Inf))

# linear predictor
mu <- int + coef * attitude$complaints

# observation model
distribution(attitude$rating) <- normal(mu, sd)
```
